channel.description: Recent content in untagged on GILBERT ROBERT M

item.title: Exploit Development
item.description: Exploit Development This is the process of developing scripts or programs that take advantage of vulnerabilities in software and make them do what they were not intended to do.

item.title: Binary Exploitation
item.description: Binary Exploitation - This is a topic in cybersec that comes down to finding a vulnerability in a program and exploiting it to gain control of a shell or to modify the programs functions. It majorly involves memory corruption.
